actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Resolution to authorize a marker in Statuary Hall for the location of Abraham Lincoln's desk during the 30th Congress.

summary.text: Directs the Architect of the Capitol to place a suitable marker in the floor of Statuary Hall at the approximate location of Abraham Lincoln's desk during the Thirtieth Congress, in accordance with a design approved by the Committee on House Administration.

titles.title: Resolution to authorize a marker in Statuary Hall for the location of Abraham Lincoln's desk during the 30th Congress.
